original_text: In the same way, a woman must not leave her husband and then marry another man. She also has done a wrong thing. It is the same as if she had sex with another woman's husband.’
korean_text: 또 아내가 남편을 버리고 다른 데로 시집 가면 간음을 행함이니라

sentences.original_text: a woman must not leave her husband

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 남자와 결혼해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: She also has done a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀 역시 잘못된 일을 한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if she had sex with another woman's husband
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 여자의 남편과 성관계를 가지는 것과
